0.name: Hubies Halloween
0.description: Despite his devotion to his hometown of Salem (and its Halloween celebration), Hubie Dubois is a figure of mockery for kids and adults alike. But this year, something is going bump in the night, and it's up to Hubie to save Halloween.

1.name: Tenet
1.description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

2.name: 365 dager
2.description: Massimo is a member of the Sicilian Mafia family and Laura is a sales director. She does not expect that on a trip to Sicily trying to save her relationship, Massimo will kidnap her and give her 365 days to fall in love with him.

3.name: Promising Young Woman
3.description: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.

4.name: The Empty Man
4.description: On the trail of a missing girl, an ex-cop comes across a secretive group attempting to summon a terrifying supernatural entity.

5.name: Freaky
5.description: After swapping bodies with a deranged serial killer, a high-school senior discovers that she has fewer than 24 hours before the change becomes permanent.

6.name: Host
6.description: Six friends hire a medium to hold a seance via Zoom during lockdown, but they get far more than they bargained for as things quickly go wrong.

7.name: Den usynlige mann
7.description: When Cecilia's abusive ex takes his own life and leaves her his fortune, she suspects his death was a hoax. As a series of coincidences turn lethal, Cecilia works to prove that she is being hunted by someone nobody can see.

8.name: Underwater
8.description: A crew of oceanic researchers working for a deep sea drilling company try to get to safety after a mysterious earthquake devastates their deepwater research and drilling facility located at the bottom of the Mariana Trench.

9.name: After We Collided
9.description: Based on the 2014 romance novel of the same name, this follows the love life of two young adults.

10.name: Hamilton
10.description: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

11.name: The Hunt
11.description: Twelve strangers wake up in a clearing. They don't know where they are, or how they got there. They don't know they've been chosen - for a very specific purpose - The Hunt.

12.name: The Devil All the Time
12.description: Sinister characters converge around a young man devoted to protecting those he loves in a postwar backwoods town teeming with corruption and brutality.

13.name: Wonder Woman 1984
13.description: Diana must contend with a work colleague, and with a businessman whose desire for extreme wealth sends the world down a path of destruction, after an ancient artifact that grants wishes goes missing.

14.name: Run
14.description: A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her.

15.name: Sputnik
15.description: The lone survivor of an enigmatic spaceship incident hasn't returned home alone - hiding inside his body is a dangerous creature.

16.name: Greenland
16.description: A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster.

17.name: A Quiet Place 2
17.description: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path.

18.name: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)
18.description: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroines Black Canary, Huntress, and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

19.name: Becky
19.description: A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives.

20.name: The Turning
20.description: A young governess is hired to look after an orphaned girl, but the return of the girl's problematic brother uncovers secrets from their past. A modern take on Henry James' novella "The Turn of the Screw."

21.name: The Father
21.description: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

22.name: The Babysitter: Killer Queen
22.description: Two years after Cole survived a satanic blood cult, he's living another nightmare: high school. And the demons from his past? Still making his life hell.

23.name: The Night House
23.description: A widow begins to uncover her recently deceased husband's disturbing secrets.

24.name: Extraction
24.description: Tyler Rake, a fearless black market mercenary, embarks on the most deadly extraction of his career when he's enlisted to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

25.name: Alone
25.description: A recently widowed traveler is kidnapped by a cold blooded killer, only to escape into the wilderness where she is forced to battle against the elements as her pursuer closes in on her.

26.name: Sjel
26.description: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

27.name: The Call
27.description: Two people live in different times. Seo-Yeon lives in the present and Young-Sook lives in the past. One phone call connects the two, and their lives are changed irrevocably.

28.name: Sonic the Hedgehog
28.description: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.

29.name: EMMA.
29.description: In 1800s England, a well meaning but selfish young woman meddles in the love lives of her friends.

30.name: Roald Dahls Heksene
30.description: A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.

31.name: The Craft: Legacy
31.description: A group of high school students form a coven of witches.

32.name: Et glass til
32.description: Four high-school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.

33.name: Greyhound
33.description: Several months after the U.S. entry into World War II, an inexperienced U.S. Navy commander must lead an Allied convoy being stalked by a German submarine wolf pack.

34.name: Shiva Baby
34.description: At a Jewish funeral service with her parents, a college student runs into her sugar daddy and ex girlfriend.

35.name: I'm Thinking of Ending Things
35.description: Full of misgivings, a young woman travels with her new boyfriend to his parents' secluded farm. Upon arriving, she comes to question everything she thought she knew about him, and herself.

36.name: Unhinged
36.description: After a confrontation with an unstable man at an intersection, a woman becomes the target of his rage.

37.name: Enola Holmes
37.description: When Enola Holmes (Sherlock's teen sister) discovers her mother is missing, she endeavours to find her, becoming a super-sleuth in her own right as she outwits her famous brother and unravels a dangerous conspiracy.

38.name: Mulan
38.description: To keep her ailing father from serving in the Imperial Army, a fearless young woman disguises herself as a man and battles northern invaders in China.

39.name: Possessor
39.description: An agent works for a secretive organization that uses brain-implant technology to inhabit other people's bodies - ultimately driving them to commit assassinations for high-paying clients.

40.name: Nine Days
40.description: A reclusive man conducts a series of interviews with human souls for a chance to be born.

41.name: A Nice Girl Like You
41.description: After being accused of being too inhibited by her ex-boyfriend, a violinist creates a rather wild to-do list that sends her on a whirlwind journey of self-discovery.

42.name: Palm Springs
42.description: Stuck in a time loop, two wedding guests develop a budding romance while living the same day over and over again.

43.name: Dolittle
43.description: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

44.name: The Dark and the Wicked
44.description: On a secluded farm in a nondescript rural town, a man is slowly dying. His family gathers to mourn, and soon a darkness grows, marked by waking nightmares and a growing sense that something evil is taking over the family.

45.name: The Dry
45.description: Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken hometown to attend a tragic funeral. But his return opens a decades-old wound - the unsolved death of a teenage girl.

46.name: The Old Guard
46.description: A covert team of immortal mercenaries is suddenly exposed and must now fight to keep their identity a secret just as an unexpected new member is discovered.

47.name: I Care a Lot
47.description: A crooked legal guardian who drains the savings of her elderly wards meets her match when a woman she tries to swindle turns out to be more than she first appears.

48.name: Pieces of a Woman
48.description: When a young mother's home birth ends in unfathomable tragedy, she begins a year-long odyssey of mourning that fractures relationships with loved ones in this deeply personal story of a woman learning to live alongside her loss.

49.name: Love and Monsters
49.description: Seven years after he survived the monster apocalypse, lovably hapless Joel leaves his cozy underground bunker behind on a quest to reunite with his high school sweetheart.

50.name: Dune
50.description: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.

51.name: Infinite
51.description: A man discovers that his hallucinations are actually visions from past lives.

52.name: Cruella
52.description: A live-action prequel feature film following a young Cruella de Vil.

53.name: Boiling Point
53.description: Enter the relentless pressure of a restaurant kitchen as a head chef wrangles his team on the busiest day of the year.

54.name: The Suicide Squad
54.description: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker, and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.

55.name: Last Night in Soho
55.description: Aspiring fashion designer Eloise is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s, where she encounters dazzling wannabe singer Sandie. But the glamour is not as it seems, and the dreams of the past crack and splinter into something darker.

56.name: Spiral: From the Legacy of Saw
56.description: A criminal mastermind unleashes a twisted form of justice in Spiral, the terrifying new chapter from the book of Saw.

57.name: Licorice Pizza
57.description: The story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up, running around and going through the treacherous navigation of first love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.

58.name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
58.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

59.name: The Black Phone
59.description: After being abducted by a child killer and locked in a soundproof basement, a 13-year-old boy starts receiving calls on a disconnected phone from the killer's previous victims.

60.name: Nobody
60.description: A docile family man slowly reveals his true character after his house gets burgled by two petty thieves, which, coincidentally, leads him into a bloody war with a Russian crime boss.

61.name: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
61.description: When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.

62.name: No Time to Die
62.description: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

63.name: The Many Saints of Newark
63.description: Witness the making of Tony Soprano. The story that reveals the humanity behind Tony's struggles and the influence his family - especially his uncle, Dickie Moltisanti - had over him becoming the most iconic mob boss of all time.

64.name: The King's Man
64.description: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions.

65.name: Old
65.description: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

66.name: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
66.description: The Warrens investigate a murder that may be linked to a demonic possession.

67.name: The Matrix Resurrections
67.description: Return to a world of two realities: one, everyday life; the other, what lies behind it. To find out if his reality is a construct, to truly know himself, Mr. Anderson will have to choose to follow the white rabbit once more.

68.name: The Little Things
68.description: Kern County Deputy Sheriff Joe Deacon is sent to Los Angeles for what should have been a quick evidence-gathering assignment. Instead, he becomes embroiled in the search for a serial killer who is terrorizing the city.

69.name: Malignant
69.description: Madison is paralyzed by shocking visions of grisly murders, and her torment worsens as she discovers that these waking dreams are in fact terrifying realities.

70.name: Halloween Kills
70.description: Surviving victims of Michael Myers form a vigilante mob and vow to end his reign of terror.

71.name: Don't Look Up
71.description: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn humankind of an approaching comet that will destroy planet Earth.

72.name: Encanto
72.description: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

73.name: Free Guy
73.description: When Guy, a bank teller, learns that he is a non-player character in a bloodthirsty, open-world video game, he goes on to become the hero of the story and takes the responsibility of saving the world.

74.name: The Voyeurs
74.description: Pippa and Thomas move into their dream apartment, they notice that their windows look directly into the apartment opposite, this will set in motion a chain of events that will lead to disaster.

75.name: Fear Street: 1994
75.description: A circle of teenage friends accidentally encounter the ancient evil responsible for a series of brutal murders that have plagued their town for over 300 years. Welcome to Shadyside.

76.name: Syng 2
76.description: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

77.name: The French Dispatch
77.description: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in "The French Dispatch Magazine".

78.name: Those Who Wish Me Dead
78.description: A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.

79.name: Mortal Kombat
79.description: MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.

80.name: Eternals
80.description: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

81.name: Wrath of Man
81.description: A cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving a lot of money around Los Angeles each week.

82.name: Pleasure
82.description: Bella Cherry arrives in Los Angeles with dreams of becoming an adult film star, but she soon learns that fame won't come easy as she harnesses her ambition and cunning to rise to the top of this mesmerizing and singular world.

83.name: Girl in the Basement
83.description: Sarah is a teen girl who is looking forward to her 18th birthday to move away from her controlling father Don. But before she could even blow out the candles, Don imprisons her in the basement of their home.

84.name: Candyman
84.description: A sequel to the horror film Candyman (1992) that returns to the now-gentrified Chicago neighborhood where the legend began.

85.name: Land
85.description: Edee, in the aftermath of an unfathomable event, finds herself unable to stay connected to the world and retreats to the wilds of the Rockies. After a local hunter brings her back from the brink of death, she must find a way to live again.

86.name: Nightmare Alley
86.description: A grifter working his way up from low-ranking carnival worker to lauded psychic medium matches wits with a psychologist bent on exposing him.

87.name: CODA
87.description: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her passion at Berklee College of Music and her fear of abandoning her parents.

88.name: Fast & Furious 9
88.description: Dom and the crew must take on an international terrorist who turns out to be Dom and Mia's estranged brother.

89.name: The Last Duel
89.description: The Knight Jean de Carrouges must settle the dispute over his wife Marguerite by challenging his squire to a duel to the death.

90.name: PAW Patrol: Filmen
90.description: Ryder and the pups are called to Adventure City to stop Mayor Humdinger from turning the bustling metropolis into a state of chaos.

91.name: The Fallout
91.description: High schooler Vada navigates the emotional fallout she experiences in the wake of a school tragedy. Relationships with her family, friends and view of the world are forever altered.

92.name: Zack Snyder's Justice League
92.description: Determined to ensure that Superman's ultimate sacrifice wasn't in vain, Bruce Wayne recruits a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

93.name: Verdens verste menneske
93.description: The chronicles of four years in the life of Julie, a young woman who navigates the troubled waters of her love life and struggles to find her career path, leading her to take a realistic look at who she really is.

94.name: Fear Street - del 2: 1978
94.description: Shadyside, 1978. School's out for summer and the activities at Camp Nightwing are about to begin. But when another Shadysider is possessed with the urge to kill, the fun in the sun becomes a gruesome fight for survival.

95.name: The Unforgivable
95.description: A woman is released from prison after serving a sentence for a violent crime and re-enters a society that refuses to forgive her past.

96.name: Godzilla vs Kong
96.description: The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against each other--the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong--with humanity caught in the balance.

97.name: The Forever Purge
97.description: All the rules are broken as a sect of lawless marauders decides that the annual Purge does not stop at daybreak and instead should never end.

98.name: Black Widow
98.description: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

99.name: The Green Knight
99.description: A fantasy retelling of the medieval story of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight.

100.name: Talk to Me
100.description: When a group of friends discover how to conjure spirits using an embalmed hand, they become hooked on the new thrill, until one of them goes too far and unleashes terrifying supernatural forces.

101.name: X
101.description: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film in rural Texas, but when their reclusive, elderly hosts catch them in the act, the cast find themselves fighting for their lives.

102.name: Pearl
102.description: In 1918, a young woman on the brink of madness pursues stardom in a desperate attempt to escape the drudgery, isolation, and lovelessness of life on her parents' farm.

103.name: The Batman
103.description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

104.name: Triangle of Sadness
104.description: A fashion model celebrity couple join an eventful cruise for the super-rich.

105.name: Babylon
105.description: A tale of outsized ambition and outrageous excess, it traces the rise and fall of multiple characters during an era of unbridled decadence and depravity in early Hollywood.

106.name: Skrik 5
106.description: 25 years after a streak of brutal murders shocked the quiet town of Woodsboro, Calif., a new killer dons the Ghostface mask and begins targeting a group of teenagers to resurrect secrets from the town's deadly past.

107.name: Mord på Nilen
107.description: While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.

108.name: Everything Everywhere All at Once
108.description: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

109.name: The Menu
109.description: A young couple travels to a remote island to eat at an exclusive restaurant where the chef has prepared a lavish menu, with some shocking surprises.

110.name: Hocus Pocus 2
110.description: Two young women accidentally bring back the Sanderson Sisters to modern day Salem and must figure out how to stop the child-hungry witches from wreaking havoc on the world.

111.name: Top Gun: Maverick
111.description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

112.name: Barbarian
112.description: A woman staying at an Airbnb discovers that the house she has rented is not what it seems.

113.name: Don't Worry Darling
113.description: While her husband leaves home everyday to work in a top secret facility, a young 1950s housewife begins to question her life when she notices strange behavior from the other wives in the neighborhood.

114.name: Avatar: The Way of Water
114.description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

115.name: A Man Called Otto
115.description: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.

116.name: M3GAN
116.description: A robotics engineer at a toy company builds a life-like doll that begins to take on a life of its own.

117.name: Smile
117.description: After witnessing a bizarre, traumatic incident involving a patient, a psychiatrist becomes increasingly convinced she is being threatened by an uncanny entity.

118.name: Terrifier 2
118.description: After being resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to the timid town of Miles County where he targets a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween night.

119.name: Nope
119.description: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

120.name: The Lost City
120.description: A reclusive romance novelist on a book tour with her cover model gets swept up in a kidnapping attempt that lands them both in a cutthroat jungle adventure.

121.name: Bullet Train
121.description: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common.

122.name: The Fabelmans
122.description: Growing up in post-World War II era Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman aspires to become a filmmaker as he reaches adolescence, but soon discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of films can help him see the truth.

123.name: Halloween Ends
123.description: The saga of Michael Myers and Laurie Strode comes to a spine-chilling climax in the final installment of this trilogy.

124.name: The Whale
124.description: A reclusive, morbidly obese English teacher attempts to reconnect with his estranged teenage daughter.

125.name: Sisu
125.description: When an ex-soldier who discovers gold in the Lapland wilderness tries to take the loot into the city, Nazi soldiers led by a brutal SS officer battle him.

126.name: Prey
126.description: Naru, a skilled warrior of the Comanche Nation, fights to protect her tribe against one of the first highly-evolved Predators to land on Earth.

127.name: Fall
127.description: When a high-rise climb goes wrong, best friends Becky and Hunter find themselves stuck at the top of a 2,000-foot TV tower.

128.name: The Banshees of Inisherin
128.description: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.

129.name: Glass Onion
129.description: Tech billionaire Miles Bron invites his friends for a getaway on his private Greek island. When someone turns up dead, Detective Benoit Blanc is put on the case.

130.name: The Blackening
130.description: Seven friends go away for the weekend and end up trapped in a cabin with a killer who has a vendetta. Will their street smarts and knowledge of horror movies help them stay alive? Probably not.

131.name: Aftersun
131.description: Sophie reflects on the shared joy and private melancholy of a holiday she took with her father twenty years earlier. Memories real and imagined fill the gaps between as she tries to reconcile the father she knew with the man she didn't...

132.name: Hellraiser
132.description: A take on Clive Barker's 1987 horror classic where a young woman struggling with addiction comes into possession of an ancient puzzle box, unaware that its purpose is to summon the Cenobites.

133.name: Thor: Love and Thunder
133.description: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

134.name: The Northman
134.description: A young Viking prince is on a quest to avenge his father's murder.

135.name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
135.description: Doctor Strange teams up with a mysterious teenage girl from his dreams who can travel across multiverses, to battle multiple threats, including other-universe versions of himself, which threaten to wipe out millions across the multiverse. They seek help from Wanda the Scarlet Witch, Wong and others.

136.name: Der krepsene synger
136.description: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the Deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man with whom she was once involved.

137.name: Amsterdam
137.description: In the 1930s, three friends witness a murder, are framed for it, and uncover one of the most outrageous plots in American history.

138.name: Pus med støvler: Et siste ønske
138.description: When Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll and he has burned through eight of his nine lives, he launches an epic journey to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.

139.name: The Pale Blue Eye
139.description: A world-weary detective is hired to investigate the murder of a West Point cadet. Stymied by the cadets' code of silence, he enlists one of their own to help unravel the case - a young man the world would come to know as Edgar Allan Poe.

140.name: Skinamarink
140.description: Two children wake up in the middle of the night to find their father is missing, and all the windows and doors in their home have vanished.

141.name: Bodies Bodies Bodies
141.description: When a group of rich 20-somethings plan a hurricane party at a remote family mansion, a party game turns deadly in this fresh and funny look at backstabbing, fake friends, and one party gone very, very wrong.

142.name: Motorsagmassakren
142.description: After 48 years of hiding, Leatherface returns to terrorize a group of idealistic young friends who accidentally disrupt his carefully shielded world in a remote Texas town.

143.name: Bones and All
143.description: A young woman embarks on a 1000 mile odyssey through America where she meets a disenfranchised drifter. But all roads lead back to their terrifying pasts and to a final stand that will determine whether love can survive their otherness.

144.name: Intet nytt fra vestfronten
144.description: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

145.name: Tár
145.description: Set in the international world of Western classical music, the film centers on Lydia Tár, widely considered one of the greatest living composer-conductors and the very first female director of a major German orchestra.

146.name: Elvis
146.description: The life of American music icon Elvis Presley, from his childhood to becoming a rock and movie star in the 1950s while maintaining a complex relationship with his manager, Colonel Tom Parker.

147.name: Jurassic World Dominion
147.description: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.

148.name: The Gray Man
148.description: When the CIA's most skilled operative, whose true identity is known to none, accidentally uncovers dark agency secrets, a psychopathic former colleague puts a bounty on his head, setting off a global manhunt by international assassins.

149.name: Speak No Evil
149.description: A Danish family visits a Dutch family they met on a holiday. What was supposed to be an idyllic weekend slowly starts unraveling as the Danes try to stay polite in the face of unpleasantness.

150.name: Reptile
150.description: Tom Nichols is a hardened New England detective, unflinching in his pursuit of a case where nothing is as it seems and it begins to dismantle the illusions in his own life.

151.name: Fair Play
151.description: An unexpected promotion at a cutthroat hedge fund pushes a young couple's relationship to the brink, threatening to unravel far more than their recent engagement.

152.name: Totally Killer
152.description: When the infamous "Sweet Sixteen Killer" returns 35 years after his first murder spree to claim another victim, 17-year-old Jamie accidentally travels back in time to 1987, determined to stop the killer before he can start.

153.name: The Exorcist: Believer
153.description: When two girls disappear into the woods and return three days later with no memory of what happened to them, the father of one girl seeks out Chris MacNeil, who's been forever altered by what happened to her daughter fifty years ago.

154.name: The Creator
154.description: Against the backdrop of a war between humans and robots with artificial intelligence, a former soldier finds the secret weapon, a robot in the form of a young child.

155.name: Killers of the Flower Moon
155.description: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

156.name: Saw X
156.description: A sick and desperate John travels to Mexico for a risky and experimental medical procedure in hopes of a miracle cure for his cancer only to discover the entire operation is a scam to defraud the most vulnerable.

157.name: Haunted Mansion
157.description: A single mom named Gabbie hires a tour guide, a psychic, a priest and a historian to help exorcise her newly bought mansion after discovering it is inhabited by ghosts.

158.name: Nowhere
158.description: A young pregnant woman named Mia escapes from a country at war by hiding in a maritime container aboard a cargo ship. After a violent storm, Mia gives birth to the child while lost at sea, where she must fight to survive.

159.name: The Iron Claw
159.description: The true story of the inseparable Von Erich brothers, who made history in the intensely competitive world of professional wrestling in the early 1980s.

160.name: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
160.description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team must track down a dangerous weapon before it falls into the wrong hands.

161.name: The Equalizer 3 - The Final Chapter
161.description: Robert McCall finds himself at home in Southern Italy but he discovers his friends are under the control of local crime bosses. As events turn deadly, McCall knows what he has to do: become his friends' protector by taking on the mafia.

162.name: Five Nights at Freddy's
162.description: A troubled security guard begins working at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. During his first night on the job, he realizes that the night shift won't be so easy to get through. Pretty soon he will unveil what actually happened at Freddy's.

163.name: Barbie
163.description: Barbie suffers a crisis that leads her to question her world and her existence.

164.name: Pet Sematary: Bloodlines
164.description: In 1969 a young Jud Crandall and his childhood friends band together to confront an ancient evil that has gripped their hometown of Ludlow.

165.name: No One Will Save You
165.description: An exiled anxiety-ridden homebody must battle an alien who's found its way into her home.

166.name: Oppenheimer
166.description: The story of American scientist, J. Robert Oppenheimer, and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

167.name: The Burial
167.description: Inspired by true events, a lawyer helps a funeral home owner save his family business from a corporate behemoth, exposing a complex web of race, power, and injustice.

168.name: Sound of Freedom
168.description: The incredible true story of a former government agent turned vigilante who embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue hundreds of children from traffickers.

169.name: Expendables 4
169.description: Armed with every weapon they can get their hands on, the Expendables are the world's last line of defense and the team that gets called when all other options are off the table.

170.name: The Nun 2
170.description: 1956 - France. A priest is murdered. An evil is spreading. The sequel to the worldwide smash hit follows Sister Irene as she once again comes face-to-face with Valak, the demon nun.

171.name: Ballerina
171.description: Grieving the loss of a best friend she couldn't protect, an ex-bodyguard sets out to fulfill her dear friend's last wish: sweet revenge.

172.name: Mord i Venezia
172.description: In post-World War II Venice, Poirot, now retired and living in his own exile, reluctantly attends a seance. But when one of the guests is murdered, it is up to the former detective to once again to uncover the killer.

173.name: Pain Hustlers
173.description: Liza dreams of a better life for her and her daughter. She gets a job at a bankrupt pharmacy, and Liza's guts catapult the company and her into the high life, putting her in the middle of a criminal conspiracy.

174.name: The Boogeyman
174.description: Still reeling from the tragic death of their mother, a teenage girl and her younger sister find themselves plagued by a sadistic presence in their house and struggle to get their grieving father to pay attention before it's too late.

175.name: Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour
175.description: Experience the breathtaking Eras Tour concert, performed by the one and only Taylor Swift.

176.name: Elemental
176.description: Follows Ember and Wade, in a city where fire-, water-, earth- and air-residents live together.

177.name: Doggy Style
177.description: An abandoned dog teams up with other strays to get revenge on his former owner.

178.name: Khufiya
178.description: Krishna Mehra who is an operative at Indian spy agency known as R&AW. She is assigned to track down the mole selling India's defense secrets, while all along grappling with her dual identity as a spy and a lover.

179.name: Wonka
179.description: The story will focus specifically on a young Willy Wonka and how he met the Oompa-Loompas on one of his earliest adventures.

180.name: OMG 2
180.description: An unhappy civilian asks the court to mandate comprehensive education in schools in a dramatic yet amusing courtroom play.

181.name: Gran Turismo
181.description: Based on the unbelievable, inspiring true story of a team of underdogs - a struggling, working-class gamer, a failed former race car driver, and an idealistic motorsport exec - who risk it all to take on the most elite sport in the world.

182.name: V/H/S/85
182.description: Unveiled through a made-for-TV documentary, five tales of found footage horror emerge to take viewers on a terrifying journey into the grim underbelly of the 1980s.

183.name: Desperation Road
183.description: A Southern Noir thriller, set in a tough-and-tumble Mississippi town where a woman and her young daughter are caught in the crossfire when whiskey, guns, and the desire for revenge violently intersect.

184.name: Meg 2: The Trench
184.description: A research team encounters multiple threats while exploring the depths of the ocean, including a malevolent mining operation.

185.name: Dumb Money
185.description: Dumb Money is the ultimate David vs. Goliath tale, based on the insane true story of everyday people who flipped the script on Wall Street and got rich by turning GameStop (the video game store) into the world's hottest company.

186.name: Poor Things
186.description: The incredible tale about the fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter, a young woman brought back to life by the brilliant and unorthodox scientist Dr. Godwin Baxter.

187.name: John Wick: Chapter 4
187.description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

188.name: No Hard Feelings
188.description: On the brink of losing her home, Maddie finds an intriguing job listing: helicopter parents looking for someone to bring their introverted 19-year-old son out of his shell before college. She has one summer to make him a man or die trying.

189.name: The Kill Room
189.description: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

190.name: After Everything
190.description: After breaking up with his true love, best-selling author Hardin Scott travels to Portugal in an attempt to make amends for his past behavior.

191.name: Blue Beetle
191.description: An alien scarab chooses Jaime Reyes to be its symbiotic host, bestowing the recent college graduate with a suit of armor that's capable of extraordinary powers, forever changing his destiny as he becomes the superhero known as Blue Beetle.

192.name: Paw Patrol: Superfilmen
192.description: A magical meteor crash lands in Adventure City and gives the PAW Patrol pups superpowers, transforming them into The Mighty Pups

193.name: Den lille havfruen
193.description: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

194.name: It Lives Inside
194.description: An Indian-American teenager struggling with her cultural identity has a falling out with her former best friend and, in the process, unwittingly releases a demonic entity that grows stronger by feeding on her loneliness.

195.name: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
195.description: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

196.name: Leave the World Behind
196.description: Family drama based on the novel by Rumaan Alam.

197.name: The Covenant
197.description: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

198.name: The Mill
198.description: A businessman mysteriously wakes up in an open-air prison cell with only an old grist mill. Forced to work as a beast of burden, he must find a way to escape before the birth of his child.

199.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
199.description: The film follows the Turtle brothers as they work to earn the love of New York City while facing down an army of mutants.
